trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rushville
There were no other sightings in Rushville on or around March 7th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsIn my car just left a village pantry.. Fast moving object caught my eye I thought it was the B2 bomber at first... Then it went up on its side I got a full view then I said that's not the B2 the object moved from side to side like it was playing or on a joy ride fast moving no sound no heat exhaust ... I had no clue what I was seeing flying thru the sky that morning and then it just took off BAM!! Gone
Summary: Disc . Flat gray color shined in direct sun light some pattern
